name: Torchr Runners: Demastered
storyline:
In a world shrouded in darkness, you and your fellow players carry torches that slowly extinguish. As your light fades, so does your sanity. Teamwork is crucial to overcome the puzzles ahead, and if your torches or sanity deplete, the game is lost.
In this eerie, ever-changing world, each level is a new challenge, from short and intense sprints to longer, multi-part stages with safe zones. The faster you complete levels, the more coins you earn – but beware, your coins drain over time. Use your hard-earned coins to buy extra sanity or lives at scattered shops, but don’t linger too long – time and resources are limited!
The heart of the experience is cooperation. The game’s shared pool of lives means everyone must work together to survive. Each failure takes a toll on the group – and the sadistic narrator, "The Torcherer," is more than happy to mock your every misstep. Laughing at your failures, showing off death photos, and reminding you just how fragile teamwork can be, he’s there to make sure you don’t forget your mistakes.
Can you and your team survive the torch, the dark, and the unrelenting taunts of the Torcherer?
summary: It's an online co-op indie, runner 3d platformer with a bit of puzzle and surreal. "Carry your flickering torch through perilous puzzles in this retro-inspired cooperative platformer. Work together to keep your sanity intact, beat mind-bending challenges, and survive the misanthropic taunts of the "Torcherer" – all while racing against time before your light runs out!"
